On the 6th Anniversary of DACA, a few facts:
 
-> Trump arbitrarily ended DACA.
-> The majority of Americans believe we should protect Dreamers.
-> The GOP has control of the House, Senate & White House.
 
They can & should act to pass the DREAM Act.

Republicans are going to try to use ending the immoral policy of separating children & parents as leverage to pass some other immoral policy. It should be ended period - no strings attached. There's no room for callous calculation when it comes to the wellbeing of children.

Please do not give up hope. This battle is NOT over.
